info.game_comments:
Justin Sausville game 2.
Last game of Season 27.

(1, 1).clue: The Jamaican fruit type of this emits high-frequency calls to orient itself in the dark

(2, 1).clue: Ray Charles was born with this last name, but dropped it to avoid confusion with boxer Sugar Ray

(3, 1).clue: The act that created the Department of Homeland Security was passed early in this year

(4, 1).clue: In 1968 this NYC real estate guy & 'uge, 'uge reality TV star got his economics degree from Wharton

(5, 1).clue: This 969-year-old died in the year of the flood

(1, 2).clue: The field type of this leaping insect chirps by rubbing a scraper on one forewing along a row of teeth on the other forewing

(6, 2).clue: Barbie knows a type of long surfboard is named for this California beach

(1, 3).clue: The adult male of this Asian great ape makes a "long call" heard for more than a mile & lasting up to 5 minutes

(6, 4).clue: A married woman in Bonn or Berlin

(3, 5).clue: Counterterrorism includes the presence of these on planes; they rank among those with the highest handgun accuracy

(5, 5).clue: After Cain slew Abel, "Adam knew his wife again, and she bare a son, and called his name" this

(1, 1).clue: It's space that's entirely void of matter

(5, 1).clue: In 1990 it was out with Thatcher and in with this man as British Prime Minister

(6, 1).clue: A being from outer space who might want to phone home

(3, 2).clue: This form of silica, also the name of a Michigan city, is Ohio's gemstone
